users.name: Name
users.mail-registration.made: Your profile has been created in the application:
users.mail-registration.username: The username you need to log in to the application is:
users.mail-registration.link: To log in to the application you need to register a password at the following link:
users.mail-registration.note: The profile will not be active if you do not click on the specified link and register the password.

users.edit.send_email_title: Would you like to send an email?
users.edit.send_email_description:
The user will receive an email containing a link to enter a new password.
At the same time, the existing password will be reset to a randomly generated password.
users.edit.send_email_hint: Send email for registration or password reset
users.edit.send_email_success: Email for registration or password reset has been sent successfully
users.edit.send_email_error: Email for registration or password reset failed

Only the following formats are allowed for upload:
jpg, jpeg, gif Ð¸ png

users.edit.image.save_warning: The image will be saved in the system when you click the Save button
